channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:58 Driven Alarm in Kyiv. Investigate by subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 06:58 Driven Alarm in Kyiv. Investigate by subsequent messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 06:58 Dumping anxiety in the Zhytomyr region.Creck on subsequent messages.
